TunableList.name: CATEGORY_DATAS
TunableList.description: A list of a spellbook category data.

TunableTuple.description: UI-specific data used to display a category in the spellbook.

Tunable.name: category_name
Tunable.description: Name of this category

TunableList.name: entries
TunableList.description: List of potions in this category.

Tunable.description: The potion's recipe.

TunableList.name: entries
TunableList.description: List of spells in this category.

Tunable.description: The spell.

TunableTuple.name: content_list
TunableTuple.description: Tuning used for the content list.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon used to display this category in the content list.

TunableVariant.name: tooltip
TunableVariant.description: Tooltip used in the spellbook for this category. If unset, no tooltip is shown.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

TunableTuple.name: front_page
TunableTuple.description: Tuning used for the first page of the category.

TunableVariant.name: category_description
TunableVariant.description: Description used in the spellbook. If unset, description is not shown.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon used to display this category in first page.

TunableTuple.name: page
TunableTuple.description: Tuning used for pages other than the front page of the category.

TunableVariant.name: icon
TunableVariant.description: Icon shown on each page of this category.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableTuple.name: tab
TunableTuple.description: Tuning used to display the category on the tabs at the top of the book.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon used to display the category on a tab.

TunableVariant.name: tooltip
TunableVariant.description: Tooltip used in the spellbook on the the tab for this category. If unset, Category Name is used.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: CATEGORY_ENTRY_COUNT
Tunable.description: , Number of entries allotted for the subsequent pages of a category section.

Tunable.name: CATEGORY_FRONT_PAGE_ENTRY_COUNT
Tunable.description: , Number of entries allotted for the front page of a category section.

TunableTuple.name: CATEGORY_LIST_DATA
TunableTuple.description: UI-specific data used to display second page of the spellbook.

TunableVariant.name: icon
TunableVariant.description: Icon used on the category list page of the spellbook.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableVariant.name: page_description
TunableVariant.description: Description used for this page in the spellbook. If unset, description is not shown.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: title
Tunable.description: The title to use on the category list of the spellbook.

TunableTuple.name: FRONT_PAGE_DATA
TunableTuple.description: UI-specific data used to display front page.

TunableVariant.name: icon
TunableVariant.description: Image displayed on front page of spellbook. If unset, image is not shown.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: The icon image to be displayed.

TunableVariant.name: page_description
TunableVariant.description: Description used for this page in the spellbook. If unset, description is not shown.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: title
Tunable.description: The title to use on the front page of the spellbook.

Tunable.name: INGREDIENT_FORMAT
Tunable.description: The format used for ingredients in the spellbook. First parameter will be name of ingredient, second will be quantity required. e.g. {0.String}({1.Number}) = 'Frog(1)'

Tunable.name: INGREDIENTS_LABEL
Tunable.description: Text used to display ingredients label for a spell or potion. e.g. 'Ingredients:'

TunableList.name: POTION_DISPLAY_DATA
TunableList.description: A mapping of a potion's recipe to it's spellbook display data.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The potion's recipe.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: UI-specific data used to display a potion in the spellbook.

Tunable.name: icon
Tunable.description: Icon used to display this recipe in the spellbook.

TunableVariant.name: locked_description
TunableVariant.description: Description used in the spellbook if potion is not yet unlocked. If unset, uses potion_description.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

TunableVariant.name: potion_description
TunableVariant.description: Description used in the spellbook. If unset, uses the recipe description.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

TunableVariant.name: tooltip
TunableVariant.description: Tooltip used in the spellbook. If unset, no tooltip is shown.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: A localized string that may NOT require tokens.

Tunable.name: PROGRESS_LABEL
Tunable.description: Text used to display field name for progress into a specific category. e.g. 'Learned:'

Tunable.name: PROGRESS_TEXT_FORMAT
Tunable.description: Text used to display the progress towards completing a specific category. Takes current items learned and and total available. e.g. '{0.Number}/{1.Number}'
